the existence of a

			 or the environment so requires.

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit
		  Control Act of 1985 to modify the discretionary spending limits to take into
		  account savings resulting from the reduction in the number of Federal
		  employees.
